CommandDefinition.Name: removecapacityforordertype
CommandDefinition.Description: Stop requiring the specified capacity for the given order type.

Argument.Name: orderType
Argument.Description: The name of the order type for which the capacity will no longer be required

Argument.Name: capacityName
Argument.Description: The name of the capacity that will no longer be required

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The name of the version of the application.

BoolOption.Name: u
BoolOption.Description: Update the capacity requirements for orders that are currently waiting within the scheduler.
